official-title.#text:
To prohibit an increase in the lands administered by the Bureau of Land Management until a
			 centralized database of all lands identified as suitable for disposal by
			 Resource Management Plans for lands under the administrative jurisdiction
			 of the Bureau is easily accessible to the public on a website of the
			 Bureau.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

action-desc.#text:
Reported with amendments, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union,
			 and ordered to be printed

action-instruction.#text: Omit the part struck through and insert the part printed in italic

action-desc.#text:
Reported with amendments, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union,
			 and ordered to be printed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Land Disposal Transparency and Efficiency Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Land Disposal Transparency and Efficiency Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
until a centralized database
			 of all lands identified as suitable for disposal by Resource Management
			 Plans for lands under the administrative jurisdiction of the Bureau is
			 easily accessible to the public on a website of the Bureau. The database
			 required under this subsection shall be updated and maintained to reflect
			 changes in the status of lands identified for disposal under the
			 administrative jurisdiction of the Bureau.

text.#text:
No land or interests in land may be added by acquisition, donation, transfer of administrative
			 jurisdiction, or otherwise to the inventory of land and interests in land
			 administered by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Committee on Natural Resources in the House of
			 Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
a report detailing the status and timing for completion of the
			 database required by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources in the
			 Senate

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Land Disposal Transparency and Efficiency Act/s:1/ss:b

text.#text: Not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2095 RH: Land Disposal Transparency and Efficiency Act
